name: Pink man
description: Pink man was an explorer who was known for his pink clothing.He was born in the year 1450 in the country of England. When he was just a young boy, he began to explore the world around him. He first started off by exploring the nearby forests and mountains. As he got older, he began to travel to different parts of the world. He even went to the North and South Poles. He was the first person to ever reach the top of Mount Everest.
